name: Combining Room

exits.description: You go to the mystery room.
You can not head this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You can not go this direction.
You go to the ant hill.
You go to the great outdoors.
You go to the tile room.
You see the hard wood floor.

problemDescription: The man in the wide-brimmed hat approaches you in an intimidating manner, sizing you up as it were.  'I see you have the proper equipment gathered.  Take this wand, and rub the powder into it.  After the powder is rubbed in well enough, you will know what to do with the vial.'  As you begin rubbing the powder into the wand, yet another question resounds in your head.
description: You are in the only room of a cozy little log cabin, lighted by paper lanterns hanging from the ceiling.  Empty door frames stand in front of the walls in each of the cardinal directions, and no apparent exit.  The cabin is lined with bookshelves, armoires, and desks, each brimming with papers and books.  The whole room could do with a good dusting.
